description: My neighbour recently erected a fence that extends about three feet into my backyard, according to my property survey. I've tried talking to them, showing them the survey map, but they insist their placement is correct based on an old landmark. The situation is becoming quite tense.

Following our separation agreement, my ex-partner was supposed to transfer ownership of our jointly owned car to me but has failed to do so for months. They keep making excuses, and I need the car registered in my name for insurance. Communication is non-existent.

I hired a contractor for a kitchen renovation. The work is significantly delayed, quality is poor (mismatched tiles!), and they now demand more money than agreed, citing costs not in the fixed-price contract. They've stopped work.

My employer terminated my position last week claiming redundancy. I believe it was due to my recent request for maternity leave, as my performance was excellent and others in similar roles stayed. No severance was offered.

My siblings and I disagree over distributing our late mother's property, left without a clear will. One sibling occupies the main house, preventing access or discussion about selling or dividing assets fairly among heirs.

I took a personal loan from 'SecureBank'. Due to temporary job loss, I missed two payments. I've communicated my situation, but they charge excessive penalties and agents constantly harass me, despite my efforts for a revised plan.

Our society management ignores persistent noise complaints about late-night parties from a tenant above me. Despite multiple formal complaints from residents, the noise continues, affecting our sleep.

My business partner and I disagree fundamentally on company direction (investment vs. organic growth). This deadlock hinders decisions, and our partnership agreement lacks a clear resolution mechanism.

My health insurance claim for necessary surgery was rejected by 'HealthGuard Insurance'. They cited a pre-existing condition, fully disclosed and accepted during application. Their letter seems based on misinterpreting my records.

During a routine procedure at a local clinic, I suffered nerve damage which doctors initially dismissed. A second opinion confirmed likely negligence. The clinic is unresponsive to compensation requests for ongoing treatment.
My landlord refuses essential plumbing repairs in my flat, causing leaks and water damage. The lease states it's their responsibility. Written notices sent weeks ago remain unaddressed.
Furniture ordered online from 'Elegant Homes' differs significantly in color and quality from website ads. Customer service offers only partial refund/store credit; I want a full refund and return.
My elderly parents' live-in brother pressures them to change their will for his larger share. Concerned about undue influence, I want to ensure their wishes are respected and protected.
My former employer owes final salary and unpaid leave encashment two months post-resignation. HR delays payment citing backlogs, but the legal settlement period has passed.
My bank incorrectly charged multiple fees for international transactions I didn't authorize. I provided proof, but the fraud investigation is excessively long, and charges aren't reversed.
My ex-wife makes important schooling/activity decisions for our son without consulting me, violating our custody agreement requiring mutual consent. We need to reinforce the agreement.
A tree on my neighbour's property has large branches extending dangerously over my roof. I worry about monsoon damage. My neighbour ignores polite requests to trim them.
I provided consulting services per contract. The client accepted deliverables but now disputes quality to avoid final payment, affecting my cash flow significantly.
My car insurer offers a very low settlement after an accident caused by another driver. Their assessment undervalues repair costs quoted by reputable garages.
After a minor fall, the hospital ran excessive, unexplained tests, resulting in a huge bill. I believe it's excessive billing and want to dispute charges for unconsented tests.
Our RWA imposes arbitrary pet rules not in original bylaws, threatening fines without proper discussion or voting. Several pet owners feel targeted unfairly.
My stepmother refuses to share details about my late father's assets or will. I'm a beneficiary in a copy I possess, but she controls originals and accounts. I suspect exclusion.
A high-end laptop bought online arrived with a cracked screen. Seller blames shipping, shipping blames seller. Neither takes responsibility; I'm stuck with damaged goods.
My spouse and I are divorcing amicably but need help agreeing on fair spousal support amount/duration. Our incomes differ significantly; we want resolution without extensive lawyer involvement.
My manager made inappropriate comments about my appearance during review, hinting promotion depended on off-hours 'sociability'. Felt harassed. Reported to HR; no action taken.
My credit card company incorrectly reported a late payment, hurting my score. I have proof of timely payment, but customer service hasn't corrected the error.
Adjacent construction causes unbearable noise/dust, violating local ordinances. Complaints to developer and municipality are ignored.
Invested with a friend based on verbal profit-sharing agreement. Venture is profitable, but friend denies terms and keeps most income.
Travel insurance claim for cancellation (documented family medical emergency) denied. Insurer claims reason not covered; policy wording seems ambiguous.
Doctor misdiagnosed my condition, delaying treatment and worsening health. Initial assessment missed obvious symptoms. Incurred significant extra medical expenses.
Tenant sublet apartment without permission, violating lease. Sub-tenant causes disturbances. Want to regain possession legally, preferably avoiding lengthy court process.
Gym automatically renewed membership, charging card despite written cancellation request within notice period. Customer service unreachable.
My capable adult son lives with me but refuses to contribute financially or seek work, causing financial strain and family tension. Need help setting boundaries.
Company significantly changed my job role without consent or salary adjustment, feels like constructive dismissal (demotion). Want fair exit or revert to original role.
Transferred money to wrong UPI ID by mistake. My bank and recipient's bank aren't helping recover funds despite immediate reporting.
Spouse secretly took significant loans using joint assets as collateral before separation. Creditors now pursue me. Need to determine liability and protect my share.
Neighbour's home business deliveries cause constant traffic/parking issues on narrow street, operating outside permitted hours. Affects neighbourhood quality of life.
Supplier failed critical component delivery on date, causing manufacturing delay and lost orders. Agreement has penalty clauses; supplier denies breach.
Home insurance claim for burst pipe water damage partially denied. Insurer argues poor maintenance, not pipe failure, caused damage. Pipe failure was sudden.
Dentist's cosmetic procedure resulted in complications/asymmetry needing corrective work. Dentist denies error, blames 'healing process', refuses correction costs.
Co-own inherited property with cousin. He wants immediate low-price sale; I believe waiting/renovating yields better value. Cannot agree.
Paid online course didn't provide advertised content/expert access. Restrictive refund policy; provider refuses refund despite clear misrepresentation.
Siblings disagree on managing elderly aunt's finances/living arrangements (facility vs. home care). Constant arguments about costs.
Paid less than male colleagues for same job, similar experience/qualifications. Requests for salary review based on pay equity ignored.
Mutual fund investment performed significantly worse than advisor promised. Suspect misrepresentation of risks; advisor dismisses misselling concerns.
Estranged husband filed divorce with unreasonable demands for property/alimony, exceeding fairness given finances/marriage duration. Need help negotiating.
Neighbour's dog barks incessantly day/night, disturbing peace/sleep. Polite talks, animal control complaints provided only temporary relief.
Former employee started competing business, soliciting my clients using confidential info obtained during employment, violating non-compete. Need enforcement.
Business interruption insurance claim after fire unduly delayed. Insurer keeps asking for repetitive documents, no timeline, causing cash flow problems.
Inadequate monitoring during childbirth led to complications, resulting in child's birth injury with potential long-term effects. Staff seemed unprepared. Seeking accountability.
Proposed large commercial project in residential area will increase traffic, strain resources. Zoning approval seems rushed; residents weren't properly consulted. Want to challenge.
Mobile phone under warranty has recurring fault. Authorized service center failed multiple repairs, now refuses replacement per warranty terms.
Sister borrowed significant money, promised repayment within a year. Over two years later, avoids discussion, causing relationship strain. Have messages confirming loan.
Contract includes performance bonus; targets clearly met. Company disputes calculation method, refuses full payment.
Bank closed account without adequate notice/explanation, causing payments to bounce. Reason seems related to transaction pattern misunderstanding I can clarify.
Spouse and I disagree on child's schooling (public vs. private). Different views on education/finances causing major conflict.
Neighbour consistently parks blocking my driveway access despite requests. Prevents easy car movement, especially during busy hours.
Joint venture partner not fulfilling obligations (resource allocation, marketing efforts) per agreement, jeopardizing venture success.
Home theft insurance claim value disputed. Insurer asks for old receipts I lack, applies unfairly high depreciation.
Pharmacist dispensed wrong medication dosage, causing adverse side effects. Incurred extra medical costs and discomfort due to error.
Paid deposit for wedding venue, cancelled well before deadline due to family circumstances. Venue refuses refund, citing unclear 'no refund' policy.
Landlord trying significant rent increase mid-lease, citing property tax hike. Lease specifies fixed rent for term. Want to uphold original agreement.
Family business conflict: Uncle handling finances makes decisions without consulting others, causing distrust over transparency/strategy.
Faced retaliatory actions (unfair reviews, exclusion) after reporting workplace safety violations. Fear termination.
Financial advisor recommended high-risk investment without proper risk assessment/explanation. Investment lost significant value; feel poorly advised.
Separating partner and I need formal parenting plan (visitation, holidays, communication). Generally agree but need help structuring details.
Neighbour's bright security lights shine directly into bedroom window all night, disrupting sleep. Refuse to adjust angle despite requests.
Licensed software to 'SoftCorp'. Suspect usage beyond license scope, potential reverse-engineering, violating contract terms.
Disability insurance payments abruptly stopped. Insurer claims improvement based on reports; my doctor disagrees, work ability severely limited.
Elderly relative discharged from hospital too early without adequate home care plan, leading to fall/readmission. Believe discharge planning was negligent.
Water runoff from uphill neighbor's poor drainage floods my property during heavy rains, causing erosion/landscaping damage. Ignored complaints.
Telecom company continues billing for service cancelled months ago. Provided proof; billing dept hasn't resolved, charges accumulate.
Parents lent money to sibling for business (understood as loan). Sibling now claims gift, refuses repayment discussion, causing family conflict.
Request for flexible work (remote) due to health condition denied without proper consideration/alternatives, potentially violating accommodation rules.
Bank placed unexpected hold on account funds, preventing access for days without clear reason. Caused inconvenience, missed payments.
Spouse wants job relocation to another city, significantly impacting my career/children's schooling. Need mediated decision considering all needs.
Community garden committee changed watering schedules without consulting members, affecting plants. Discussions dismissed.
Company acquired small business. Disagreements on asset valuation/integration process per agreement causing friction between management.
Life insurance claim for deceased spouse denied. Insurer alleges non-disclosure of minor, unrelated health issue from years ago.
Hospital failed proper informed consent before performing additional, non-emergency procedure during scheduled surgery. Unaware of risks/alternatives.
Sold land; buyer now claims hidden defects (soil issues) I failed to disclose. Believe I disclosed all known info; they had inspection time.
sub_category: Real estate sale/Failure to disclose dispute

description: Dry cleaner damaged expensive formal wear. Offering minimal compensation based on liability clause, doesn't cover replacement cost.
Sibling and I are co-trustees of parents' trust. Disagree on asset management/distributions per trust doc. Communication strained.
Employer consistently fails to provide payslips on time, hindering tracking earnings/deductions. Reminders to HR/manager ignored.
Home loan modification denied without clear reason, despite submitting hardship documentation. Poor communication from bank.
Unmarried partner and I lived together acquiring assets jointly. Separating now, disagree on dividing property/belongings.
Neighbour's security camera directly records my backyard/windows, invading privacy. Refuse angle adjustment despite requests.
Hired marketing agency failed promised results (lead gen targets). Reports seem inflated. Want contract termination, partial refund.
Insurer cancelled auto policy mid-term citing 'increased risk' without specifics. Believe cancellation arbitrary; want reinstatement.
Contracted hospital infection due to suspected hygiene lapses. Prolonged recovery, required additional treatment. Hospital denies breach.
Shared driveway agreement unclear on maintenance responsibilities. Needs urgent repairs; cannot agree on cost split with neighbour.
Holiday package hotel substantially inferior to advertised. Agency offers minimal compensation.
Appointed Power of Attorney for parents' finances. Sibling questions decisions, accuses mismanagement, creating family tension.
Mandatory weekend overtime conflicts with religious observances. Request for accommodation denied without exploring alternatives.
Invested in cryptocurrency scheme promoted online; turned out fraudulent. Platform vanished, advisor unreachable. Exploring recovery options.
Spouse and I strongly disagree on handling finances (saving vs. spending). Constant arguments about budgeting/goals.
Neighbour leaves garbage bins on street for days post-collection, attracting pests, creating eyesore. Informal chats, formal complaints ineffective.
Key client failed payment on several large invoices, citing minor dissatisfaction with final approved work. Outstanding amount impacts cash flow.
Critical illness insurance application rejected based on family medical history detail I believe irrelevant. Underwriting seems overly cautious.
Physical therapist provided treatment aggravating existing injury. Failed to adjust plan despite reported increased pain, lengthening recovery.

I run a small bakery. A nearby cafe ordered a large custom cake for an event but is now refusing payment, claiming the design wasn't exactly as they envisioned, though they approved the sketch and accepted delivery.
My landlord is trying to charge me for carpet cleaning upon moving out, claiming stains that were present when I moved in and documented on the initial inspection report I submitted.

My health insurance policy, provided through 'MediCare Plus', has unclear wording about coverage limits for physiotherapy. They are refusing claims beyond a certain number of sessions, which wasn't clearly stated.
My neighbour is building a large shed very close to the property line without obtaining the necessary permits from the local council, potentially violating building codes.
My spouse has a gambling problem that is severely impacting our family finances and causing immense stress. They deny the extent of the problem and refuse to seek help or agree to financial controls.
My employer has asked me to take on significantly more responsibility after a colleague left, but has refused to offer a corresponding salary increase or title change.
I believe my bank, 'FutureInvest Bank', failed to execute a timely stock trade instruction, resulting in a financial loss due to market movement. Their system logs seem incomplete.
A ride-sharing driver ('GoFast Cabs') took an unnecessarily long route, significantly increasing the fare. The company's automated support system denied my refund request without proper review.
A hospital charged me for services and tests that were seemingly duplicated or unnecessary during a short inpatient stay. The itemized bill is confusing and lacks clear justification for all charges.
My parents are gifting property unequally among siblings, leading to feelings of unfairness and straining family relationships. We need to discuss this openly.
A tree primarily located on my property has roots causing damage to my neighbour's driveway. We disagree on who is responsible for the cost of root removal and driveway repair.
My small business is in a dispute with a landlord over ambiguous terms in our commercial lease regarding common area maintenance (CAM) charges, which have increased unexpectedly.
My neighbour is claiming ownership over a small strip of land between our properties that I have maintained and used exclusively for many years (potential adverse possession claim).
My insurance company took an excessively long time to approve necessary medical treatment, causing undue stress and potentially worsening my condition due to the delay.
My neighbour plays loud music during daytime hours which interferes with my ability to work from home. While possibly within legal daytime limits, the volume and bass are extremely disruptive.
sub_category: Daytime noise nuisance (Work from home impact)

description: My spouse wants to make major, expensive renovations to our home that I feel are unnecessary and financially irresponsible given our current savings goals.
My employer failed to provide a safe working environment, resulting in a minor workplace injury due to faulty equipment they knew needed repair.
My bank continues to send statements and correspondence to an old address despite my submitting multiple change of address requests through proper channels.
A local restaurant served me food containing an allergen I explicitly mentioned when ordering, causing a mild allergic reaction. The manager was dismissive of my complaint.
A doctor provided a rushed consultation, failed to listen properly to my symptoms, and prescribed an ineffective treatment, requiring me to seek further medical help elsewhere.
My siblings and I disagree on who should be the primary decision-maker (Power of Attorney) for our aging parent's healthcare as their needs increase.
A tenant broke their lease agreement and moved out early without proper notice, leaving the property in poor condition and owing rent. I need to recover the losses.
My company is accused by a competitor of infringing on their patent. We believe our product uses different technology, but they are threatening legal action.
My neighbour has started storing commercial waste bins on their residential property near our boundary, creating unpleasant odours and attracting vermin.
My insurance company cancelled my policy retroactively after I made a claim, citing an alleged error on my initial application form from years ago.

My estranged sister accessed our joint inheritance account without my consent and withdrew funds exceeding her share. She claims it was for urgent expenses but hasn't provided proof or agreed to return the excess. Communication is hostile.

I run a catering business. A corporate client cancelled a large event booking just two days before the date, well past the cancellation deadline in our contract. They are refusing to pay the agreed-upon cancellation fee, citing unexpected budget cuts.

My landlord frequently enters my apartment without prior notice, claiming 'inspections', which violates my right to quiet enjoyment as per the lease. I've sent written complaints, but the behavior continues, making me feel uncomfortable in my own home.

My car repair insurance claim with 'MotorCare Insure' is being processed extremely slowly. It's been over two months since the accident, and they keep delaying the approval for repairs, leaving me without transport.

A local factory's emissions are causing a persistent foul odor in our neighbourhood, particularly in the evenings. Multiple residents have complained to the factory management and pollution control board, but little action has been taken.

My ex-partner is consistently late for child pick-up/drop-off times as specified in our court-ordered parenting plan. This disrupts our child's routine and causes significant scheduling issues for me. Attempts to discuss this have been unsuccessful.

I believe my recent application for an internal promotion was unfairly overlooked in favour of a less qualified external candidate. The hiring process seemed non-transparent, and feedback on my application was vague and unhelpful.

My bank, 'National Credit Bank', applied incorrect interest rates to my mortgage for several months, resulting in overcharges. They acknowledged the error but are slow in issuing the refund and correcting future statements.

A web development agency I hired failed to deliver a functional website according to the project scope and timeline. The delivered site is unusable, and they are refusing to fix the issues or provide a refund.

My doctor prescribed medication without adequately warning me about significant potential side effects, which I subsequently experienced, requiring further medical attention and time off work. I feel the risks were not properly communicated.

My uncle passed away, leaving me his property in his will. However, distant relatives have suddenly appeared, contesting the will's validity, claiming he was not of sound mind when he signed it. They are delaying the probate process.

My business leased commercial space. The landlord is unreasonably withholding consent for minor alterations needed for our operations, which are permitted under the lease terms subject to landlord approval.

My business partner wants to dissolve our partnership and start a similar competing business immediately, potentially violating the terms of our partnership agreement regarding dissolution and non-competition.
My neighbour's renovation work is causing structural cracks to appear in my adjoining wall. They deny responsibility and refuse to pause work for an independent assessment.

My home contents insurance claim after a burglary was rejected because the insurer, 'SafeGuard', claims my window locks weren't compliant with policy standards, although this wasn't clearly specified or checked when I took the policy.

My ex-spouse consistently speaks negatively about me to our children, attempting to alienate them from me. This violates the spirit, if not the letter, of our custody agreement regarding mutual respect.
My employer is forcing me to work excessive hours beyond the contractual agreement without proper overtime compensation, citing 'business needs'. This is affecting my health and personal life.

I believe my bank, 'Premier Trust', provided negligent financial advice regarding a complex investment product, leading to substantial losses. They failed to adequately explain the high risks involved given my conservative investment profile.

I purchased event tickets from a resale platform, 'TicketsNow'. The event was cancelled, but the platform is refusing a refund, directing me to the original seller who is unresponsive. The platform's guarantee seems misleading.

A hospital shared my sensitive medical information with a third party (my employer) without my explicit consent, breaching patient confidentiality. I want to understand why this happened and ensure it doesn't occur again.
My siblings and I jointly inherited a vacation property. We disagree on usage schedules, maintenance cost sharing, and whether to rent it out. We need a formal agreement.

My landlord is attempting to withhold a significant portion of my security deposit for what I consider normal wear and tear after a long tenancy. The deductions listed seem excessive and undocumented.

A software vendor, 'AlphaTech', provided my company with software that doesn't integrate with our existing systems as promised during the sales process. Their technical support has been unable to resolve the compatibility issues.

My neighbour frequently burns garden waste, creating excessive smoke that drifts into my property, affecting my family's respiratory health and preventing us from opening windows. Local ordinances restrict such burning.

My claim for damage to my insured motorcycle was rejected by 'RideSure Insurance' because I had made minor cosmetic modifications (new handlebars) which they claim voided the policy, even though the modifications were unrelated to the accident damage.
My spouse and I disagree on how to handle discipline for our children. One believes in stricter rules, the other in a more lenient approach, leading to inconsistent parenting and arguments.
My employer promised a promotion and salary increase verbally upon completion of a major project, which I successfully delivered. Now, they are delaying the promotion and citing budget constraints.

I suspect identity theft as unauthorized credit accounts have been opened in my name. My bank, 'Metro Credit Union', has been slow to investigate and resolve the fraudulent activity impacting my credit.

A local courier service, 'QuickShip', lost an important package I sent containing original documents. Their liability is limited by their terms, offering compensation far below the cost and effort required to replace the documents.

My primary care physician failed to refer me to a specialist despite recurring symptoms that indicated a more serious condition, which was later diagnosed by another doctor. This delay potentially impacted my prognosis.

My brother used our ancestral family home as collateral for a business loan without consulting other family members who have shared ownership rights. The business is now failing, and the bank is threatening foreclosure.

The common area (lobby, lift) in my apartment building is poorly maintained by the builder/management company despite collecting regular maintenance fees. Issues like broken lights and uncleanliness persist.

My small business ordered custom packaging from 'PackRight Ltd'. The delivered boxes have printing errors (wrong logo color) making them unusable for branding. They offer a small discount but refuse to reprint.
My neighbour has erected a large shed in their backyard that significantly blocks sunlight to my garden, impacting my plants. The structure might also violate local setback regulations.

My insurance company is refusing to cover water damage restoration costs fully, arguing that certain repairs fall under 'betterment' rather than 'restoration to original condition', which seems like an unfair interpretation of the policy.
My ex-spouse refuses to follow the agreed-upon schedule for our children's holiday visitations, often making last-minute changes or demanding extra time, causing disruption and conflict.
My employer has implemented a new surveillance system monitoring employee computer activity, including keystrokes and emails, without clear policy or consent. I feel this is an invasion of privacy.

A payday loan company is charging exorbitant interest rates far exceeding legal limits and using aggressive tactics for collection. I want to negotiate a fair repayment plan based on the principal amount.

I hired a moving company, 'MoveEasy Packers'. Several items of furniture were damaged during the move due to poor packing. Their insurance claim process is complicated, and the initial offer is insufficient.
A hospital emergency room wait time was excessively long, leading to a significant worsening of my condition before I was seen by a doctor. I believe the delay constituted negligent care.

My elderly mother transferred property ownership to my sibling under circumstances I believe involved emotional pressure and lack of full understanding. I want to explore options to review or reverse the transfer.

I purchased a plot of land based on representations from the seller about available utility connections (water, electricity). It turns out these connections are not readily available and require significant extra cost and effort to install.
My company merged with another, and the integration process has led to conflicting roles and unclear reporting structures between the two original teams, causing inefficiency and frustration.
My neighbour's overflowing septic tank is seeping waste onto my property, creating a health hazard and foul smell. They have ignored my requests and notices from the health department.
My insurance provider is demanding repayment of benefits they paid out, claiming a subsequent review determined the initial claim was invalid, even though the claim was approved and paid months ago.
My spouse and I disagree about financial support for our adult children (e.g., helping with college fees, down payment). We need to reach a consensus on boundaries and levels of support.
I was denied leave for a family emergency by my employer, despite having accrued leave available and providing documentation. The reason given seems arbitrary and inconsistent with company policy.
My bank charged me overdraft fees due to their delay in processing a deposited check, which should have cleared before subsequent debits occurred. They refuse to waive the fees.

A home appliance repair service ('FixItFast') charged me for a repair that didn't fix the underlying issue. The appliance broke down again shortly after, and they are refusing to return or offer a warranty repair without additional charges.

My medical records contain inaccurate information entered by a previous doctor, which is affecting my current treatment and insurance applications. The clinic is refusing to amend the records despite my providing correcting evidence.

My elderly father made significant financial 'gifts' to a non-family caregiver shortly before his health declined rapidly. Family members are concerned about potential exploitation and want to investigate the transactions.

There's an ongoing dispute over access rights to a shared pathway running between my property and my neighbour's. The original deed is ambiguous, leading to frequent arguments about usage and blockages.

My franchise agreement with 'Global Burgers' contains clauses that seem unfair regarding mandatory supplier purchases and marketing fees, significantly impacting my profitability. I want to renegotiate these terms.
My neighbour is constructing an extension that I believe exceeds permitted height limits and blocks my view. Attempts to discuss this or see their approved plans have been rebuffed.

My insurance company significantly increased my premium upon renewal without adequate justification or prior warning about the factors leading to such a large hike. I believe the increase is disproportionate.
My ex-partner and I disagree about relocating our child to a different school district following our separation. One parent wants stability, the other sees better opportunities elsewhere.

My work involves handling chemicals. My employer has failed to provide adequate safety training and personal protective equipment (PPE) despite repeated requests, creating a hazardous work environment.
My bank provided misleading information about the terms and fees associated with a fixed deposit account, resulting in lower returns than expected. Their initial explanation seems deceptive.

I hired a photographer for my wedding. The quality of the photos delivered is extremely poor (out of focus, bad lighting) and doesn't reflect the portfolio shown. They refuse any refund or reshoot possibility.
A hospital lost my medical test results, requiring me to undergo the invasive test again. This caused unnecessary distress, delay in diagnosis, and additional cost.

My aging parent needs assistance, but my siblings and I cannot agree on how to share the caregiving responsibilities fairly. One sibling feels overburdened while others seem unwilling to contribute time or finances.
A property title search revealed an old, unresolved lien against the house I recently purchased. The seller and title company failed to disclose or resolve this issue before closing.
My business partner made significant financial commitments on behalf of our company without my knowledge or consent, exceeding their authority under our agreement and putting the business at risk.

My neighbour has started feeding stray animals in large numbers, attracting rodents and creating unsanitary conditions around our shared property boundary. Health department warnings have been ignored.
My insurer is delaying approval for a medically necessary treatment recommended by my doctor, requesting excessive additional opinions and paperwork, potentially jeopardizing my health.
My spouse and I disagree about whether to have more children. This fundamental difference in life goals is causing significant strain on our marriage, and we need help communicating.
My company relocated its office, significantly increasing my commute time. They refuse to offer compensation for the increased travel costs or allow flexible work options, which feels unreasonable.
A debt collection agency is pursuing me for a debt I already settled with the original creditor years ago. They are using aggressive tactics and refuse to acknowledge proof of settlement.

I booked flight tickets through an online travel agent, 'FlyEasy'. The airline cancelled the flight, but the agent is charging a hefty service fee to process the refund, which wasn't mentioned during booking.

A nurse administered the wrong medication to me during a hospital stay, causing temporary adverse effects. While I recovered, I am concerned about the hospital's procedures and lack of transparency about the error.
My siblings disagree about selling our parents' home now that they've moved to assisted living. Some want to sell, others want to keep it in the family or rent it out. We need to reach a consensus.
A tenant moved out leaving significant damage to the property beyond normal wear and tear. The security deposit doesn't cover the full repair costs, and they are refusing to pay the difference.

My company hired a consultant who delivered a report containing plagiarized material. This was discovered after we had used the report externally, causing reputational damage. The consultant denies intentional plagiarism.
My neighbour is running an unregistered short-term rental (like Airbnb) in their apartment, leading to frequent strangers in the building, noise, and security concerns among residents.
My insurance company has drastically reduced the coverage offered in my renewal policy without clearly highlighting the changes. I only discovered the reduced coverage after needing to make a claim.
My spouse and I cannot agree on the terms of our prenuptial agreement before getting married. We have different views on asset protection and financial independence within the marriage.

I discovered my personal data was breached from my former employer's database long after I left the company. They failed to notify me promptly about the breach, potentially exposing me to identity theft.

A bank teller provided incorrect information about international transfer fees, resulting in me being charged significantly more than expected. The bank refuses to refund the difference based on their employee's error.
I bought a used car from a private seller who explicitly stated it had 'no major issues'. Within a week, the transmission failed, requiring costly repairs. The seller refuses any responsibility.
Communication breakdown occurred between hospital staff during shift change, leading to a missed medication dose for me, which temporarily worsened my condition. I am concerned about systemic issues.
My siblings and I disagree about the level of financial support our family should provide to another sibling facing hardship. Views differ on responsibility and enabling behaviour.
The builder of my new apartment failed to rectify defects (leaky windows, uneven flooring) identified during the warranty period. They keep delaying the repairs.
A competitor is using a logo and branding confusingly similar to my registered trademark, potentially misleading customers and diluting my brand identity.
My neighbour has installed multiple CCTV cameras, some appearing to point towards my property rather than just their own, raising privacy concerns.
My insurance agent sold me a policy that was unsuitable for my needs, misrepresenting the coverage benefits. I discovered this only when trying to make a claim.
My spouse and I disagree on major life decisions like career changes or potential international relocation, causing ongoing conflict about our future path together.
My job involves commission-based pay. My employer recently changed the commission structure retroactively without prior notice or agreement, significantly reducing my earnings for past sales.
I co-signed a loan for a friend who has now defaulted on payments. The bank is pursuing me for the full amount, and the friend is unresponsive.

An online subscription service, 'StreamNow', makes it extremely difficult to cancel the service, requiring phone calls with long waits and aggressive retention tactics, despite advertising easy online cancellation.
A pathology lab mixed up my test samples with another patient's, leading to an incorrect diagnosis and unnecessary anxiety and further testing before the error was rectified.
My siblings and I jointly manage rental properties inherited from our parents. We constantly argue about tenant selection, rent levels, and maintenance decisions, leading to poor property management.
A property I rent out was damaged by a storm. The tenant is claiming compensation for damaged personal belongings, which I believe should be covered by their own renter's insurance, not mine.
My business partner has started a side business that directly competes with our main partnership, potentially diverting clients and resources in violation of our agreement's loyalty clause.
sub_category: Conflict of interest/Breach of fiduciary duty

description: My neighbor installed a basketball hoop right next to our shared fence, and the constant bouncing noise and activity late into the evening is highly disruptive.
My insurance company is disputing the cause of damage to my roof, claiming it's wear and tear rather than storm damage, thereby denying coverage under my policy.
My spouse refuses to contribute equitably to household expenses despite having a similar income, leading to financial imbalance and resentment in the relationship.
After taking approved medical leave, my employer reassigned me to a lower-level position upon return, claiming my original role was filled. This feels like demotion and potential discrimination.
My bank failed to execute a stop payment request I submitted correctly and on time, resulting in a large unauthorized debit from my account.
A pest control service failed to eradicate a termite infestation despite multiple treatments under warranty. They are now suggesting costly additional treatments not covered by the initial agreement.

My medical specialist retired, and the clinic failed to provide adequate transition of care or timely transfer of my extensive medical history to my new doctor, potentially impacting continuity of treatment.
sub_category: Poor transition of care/Record transfer issue

description: My family disagrees on the care plan for our grandfather who has dementia. Some want professional in-home care, others prefer a specialized facility. We need to agree on what's best for him and how to manage the costs.
I own a small retail shop. A larger chain store nearby is using predatory pricing tactics, selling key products below cost, seemingly to drive me out of business. This feels like unfair competition.
The owner of the vacant plot next door allows weeds and debris to accumulate, creating an eyesore and attracting pests. My requests for them to maintain the property have been ignored.

My pet insurance claim for a necessary veterinary procedure was denied. The insurer, 'PetWell Care', claims the condition was pre-existing, but symptoms only appeared long after the policy waiting period ended.
My neighbour is planning an extension that would block significant natural light to my main living room window. I believe this violates my 'right to light' and want to discuss alternatives.

My ex-partner is demanding access to my personal financial records (bank statements, investments) far beyond what is relevant for calculating child support, which feels like harassment and invasion of privacy.

My employer uses non-disclosure agreements (NDAs) very broadly, preventing employees from discussing even basic working conditions or salary ranges, which seems overly restrictive and potentially illegal.

I made a large online purchase using my debit card. The item never arrived, and the seller is unresponsive. My bank, 'Digital Trust Bank', is refusing to process a chargeback, claiming debit card transactions are final.

A food delivery app, 'QuickBites', charged me for an order I never received. Their customer support provided automated responses and closed the ticket without refunding me, despite GPS showing the driver never reached my location.

During a hospital stay, a fall occurred due to inadequate safety measures (e.g., lack of bed rails, delayed response to call button). This resulted in a minor injury but highlights concerns about patient safety protocols.

My brother and I inherited our parents' business. We have conflicting management styles and visions for the future, leading to constant arguments and negatively impacting employee morale and operations.
My commercial tenant, a retail store, has made unauthorized structural changes to the leased premises without seeking my approval as required by the lease agreement.

My company outsourced a project to a third-party vendor. The vendor is now claiming intellectual property rights over developments made during the project, contrary to the 'work for hire' clause in our contract.
A neighbour frequently uses noisy power tools (saws, grinders) early on weekend mornings, violating local noise regulations and disrupting the peace.
My insurance company is requiring an excessive number of independent medical examinations (IMEs) for my ongoing injury claim, seeming like a tactic to delay or deny benefits.
My spouse and I disagree about how much involvement our respective parents (in-laws) should have in our family life and child-rearing, causing frequent tension.
My employer failed to pay required contributions to my provident fund (PF) account for several months, despite deducting the employee share from my salary.
My bank continues to send marketing calls and emails despite my explicit request to opt-out and be placed on their Do Not Disturb (DND) list.
I hired a tutor for my child. The tutor frequently cancels sessions last minute and the quality of teaching is not as promised. The agency is unresponsive to my complaints.
A surgeon left a surgical instrument inside me during an operation, requiring a second surgery to remove it. This caused significant pain, additional risk, and prolonged recovery.

My adult children are disputing the terms of a family trust set up by their grandparents, specifically regarding the timing and conditions for distributions. As trustee, I need help facilitating an agreement.
The property management company for my rented apartment is slow to respond to maintenance requests, leaving issues like a broken air conditioner unresolved for weeks during summer.
My business entered a co-marketing agreement. The partner company is using my brand logo inappropriately in their marketing materials, potentially damaging my brand reputation.
My neighbour allows their pets to roam freely and frequently enter my yard, digging up plants and causing a nuisance. Fences are not permitted by the HOA.

My insurance company has assigned multiple different adjusters to my complex property damage claim, causing inconsistent communication, repeated requests for the same information, and significant delays.

My husband and I have been living separately for the past year, and disagreements about the division of household assets have escalated. Despite several family meetings, we havent been able to reach common ground. Im seeking a fair resolution for both parties.

My brother and I jointly inherited our fathers farmland, but he has been renting it out without consulting me or sharing the income. Ive tried discussing it multiple times, but he insists its his right since he manages it. I just want transparency and an equal share.

I purchased a refrigerator from an electronics store, and within two weeks, the cooling system stopped working. The seller refuses to replace it despite the warranty. I feel cheated and want either a replacement or refund.

My employer terminated my contract abruptly, citing performance issues that were never documented. I had been performing well and received good feedback. I feel this was unfair and want compensation for wrongful termination.

I had invested in a small-scale partnership business with my friend, but after profits started coming in, he withdrew my access to the account. My attempts to reconcile have failed, and Im worried about my investment.

My insurance claim for my damaged car was rejected even after submitting all necessary documents. The company claims I delayed filing, but I have proof that I reported it on time. I need a fair review of my case.

After a minor surgery at a local clinic, I developed an infection that required hospitalization. The doctor failed to inform me about post-operative care. Im seeking accountability and reimbursement for additional expenses.

Our neighbour constantly parks his car blocking our main gate, even after repeated requests to stop. It has become a daily nuisance and is affecting our peace of mind. We want an amicable settlement to prevent further tension.

I lent money to a colleague a year ago, and despite multiple promises, he hasnt returned it. Every time I ask, he delays with excuses. I just want my money back without spoiling our professional relationship.

The construction company we hired for our home renovation stopped work midway, claiming material costs increased. We had a fixed-price agreement in writing. Were demanding completion as per contract or a refund.

After our divorce, my ex-spouse hasnt been paying the child support agreed upon during settlement. Im struggling to manage expenses alone. I just want consistent financial support for our childs wellbeing.

My landlord increased the rent without giving proper notice or updating the agreement. Ive been a tenant for five years and always paid on time. I want a reasonable rent hike and a legal lease update.

My sister has refused to allow me access to our late mothers jewellery, claiming it was gifted solely to her. Theres no written proof, but all items were part of family property. I want a fair distribution.
The bank deducted EMI twice from my account for the same month and hasnt refunded it even after multiple complaints. I have all payment receipts. I just want my money credited back quickly.

My employer has withheld my salary for the last two months claiming cash flow issues, but other employees have been paid. I depend on this income for my familys needs. I need the dues released immediately.

I purchased an insurance policy that was mis-sold as a guaranteed-return plan. When I tried to withdraw after maturity, I learned it was a market-linked scheme. I want a refund and action against the agent.
My neighbours new borewell has dried up our old one. We requested coordination on water usage, but they refuse to discuss. Its causing hardship for our household.

The hospital charged us for an emergency service that was never rendered during my fathers treatment. Even after submitting records, the billing department refuses to adjust the invoice. I want a refund for unjustified charges.
Our housing society committee approved structural changes for one member but denied my similar request without reason. I feel discriminated against and just want equal treatment.
A supplier failed to deliver goods worth 2 lakh despite advance payment. They keep postponing, citing supply issues. Im worried this might be intentional fraud.
After our fathers death, my elder brother took control of the ancestral home and refuses to let us stay there. We want a fair division of the property so everyone gets their rightful share.
The online furniture store delivered a damaged sofa and refused to pick it up despite multiple calls. I have photos and proof of the damage. I want a replacement or refund immediately.

My business partner withdrew funds from our company account for personal expenses without informing me. This has affected our operations severely. I need transparency and an agreement to prevent future misuse.
Our house help accidentally damaged an expensive appliance, and the agency refuses to take responsibility. Were seeking compensation for the loss in a fair manner.

My wife and I are in disagreement over our childs schooling. She prefers a private institution while I believe the nearby public school is sufficient. We need a neutral mediator to help decide whats best for our child.
The builder promised possession of our flat by last December, but construction has stalled. They continue demanding payments despite no progress. We want the project completed or refunded.
After years of marriage, weve grown apart and agreed to separate amicably. However, there are disagreements about custody of our pet dog and joint savings. We wish to resolve this peacefully.
My neighbour plays loud music late at night despite repeated requests to lower the volume. Its disturbing our sleep and affecting my elderly parents health. Were hoping for a peaceful resolution.
The hospital failed to provide an ambulance during a critical emergency, causing a delay in treatment. This negligence endangered my mothers life. We want the hospital to take accountability.
Our shop lease agreement expired, and the landlord refuses to renew despite verbal assurance earlier. Weve built a customer base here and want a reasonable extension.
I ordered kitchen appliances online but received counterfeit items instead of the branded ones shown. The seller is unresponsive to complaints. I need a refund and action against the seller.
My employer reduced my salary without notice, citing market slowdown. There was no prior discussion or written agreement. I want either restoration of pay or mutual renegotiation.
A relative borrowed my car and damaged it in an accident but refuses to pay for repairs. I want to recover the expenses without creating family tension.
The online course I enrolled in was advertised as live sessions, but it turned out to be pre-recorded videos. The company refuses a refund. I feel misled and want my money back.
The cooperative bank where I have a fixed deposit has delayed releasing the maturity amount for over two months. Their responses have been vague, and Im concerned about my savings.

Our family jointly owns a small house in Mangalore, but my cousin has rented out his portion without informing the rest of us. We are concerned about unauthorized tenants and want clarity on ownership rights and rental income distribution.

The hospital overcharged my fathers surgery by adding items not discussed in the estimate. When we questioned the bill, the administration claimed those were standard charges without providing details.
I was dismissed from my role as a warehouse supervisor without any prior warning or written explanation. My employer claims poor performance, but I was never given any appraisal or chance to improve.

A close relative took a personal loan from me and agreed to repay within six months, but it has now been over two years. Despite repeated reminders, he keeps delaying repayment citing financial issues.

I purchased a new smartphone online, but it stopped working within a week. The seller is refusing replacement, claiming its a manufacturer issue, while the service center says its seller responsibility.
My brother and I inherited agricultural land, but he has leased the entire area to another farmer without consulting me. I want the lease reviewed and fair compensation provided.
After paying full advance for a furniture order, the shop owner delivered incomplete and low-quality pieces. He now refuses refund, claiming the items are custom-built and non-returnable.
A local construction company encroached on a small part of our residential land while expanding their site. Despite several requests, they refuse to acknowledge or compensate for the damage.

I had an insurance policy covering my restaurant for fire accidents, but after a small kitchen fire, the insurer rejected my claim citing 'improper maintenance'. I feel this is unfair as all safety norms were followed.
My employer delayed my final settlement for over three months after I resigned. HR keeps saying it's under processing, but theres no clarity or confirmation date.
Our neighbors keep using our private borewell for their gardening needs without permission. Despite several polite requests, they continue to access it early mornings.
I invested in a small partnership business with my friend, but after profits started coming in, he stopped sharing statements and refuses to discuss accounts. I suspect misappropriation.
My husband and I are separated, and he is not providing any maintenance for our child. I have limited income and need financial support as previously agreed verbally.
The contractor hired for home renovation abandoned the project halfway despite full payment of the first installment. He is not responding to calls or messages.
I slipped and fractured my leg at a local hospital due to a wet, unmarked floor. The management offered only verbal apologies but no compensation for medical costs.
My tenant has not paid rent for three consecutive months and refuses to vacate, claiming financial hardship. I need possession of my property to rent it again.
I was offered a job after an interview and resigned from my old company, but the new employer withdrew the offer at the last minute without any valid reason.
My business partner used the companys funds for personal expenses without informing anyone. The accountant confirmed multiple withdrawals unrelated to business.
The builder delayed possession of my apartment by over a year despite full payment. They keep promising revised dates but have not provided compensation for rent expenses.
My insurance claim for my car accident was rejected because they claimed I failed to inform within 24 hours. I had informed them the next day, and it seems unfair to deny coverage.
The new ATM installed near our house makes loud mechanical noises all night. Despite several complaints, the bank has not addressed the disturbance.
After the death of my father, my elder brother took full control of the family assets and is refusing to disclose the will. We want a fair division among all siblings.
Our apartment association is not transparent with monthly maintenance expenses. A few of us want detailed records and a system for shared decision-making.
A local shopkeeper sold us expired packaged food, and when confronted, he refused replacement or refund, arguing that we should have checked the expiry date ourselves.
My ex-husband is not following the visitation schedule agreed upon during separation. He keeps cancelling meetings with our child, causing emotional stress.
The hospital misdiagnosed my mothers infection as mild, delaying treatment and leading to severe complications. We want accountability and compensation for negligence.
A friend borrowed my car and caused an accident but refuses to pay for the damages. He claims my insurance should cover it entirely, which is unfair.
I had booked a banquet hall for a family function, but the owner cancelled two days before the event without refund. I had to make costly last-minute arrangements.
Our apartments top-floor owner keeps dumping construction debris from renovation onto the shared terrace area. Despite multiple complaints, he continues doing it.
The bank mistakenly deducted double EMI payments from my loan account and has not refunded the excess despite several follow-ups. They only respond with generic emails.
My landlord increased the rent by 40% suddenly without notice, contrary to the agreement. I have lived here for three years and need a reasonable negotiation.
A co-worker has been spreading false rumors about my professional conduct, which affected my appraisal. HR has not taken any strict action yet.
Our small textile company was promised payment from a retailer after supply delivery, but its been over three months and the payment is still pending despite multiple reminders.
I discovered unauthorized transactions from my credit card last week. The bank says I must prove it wasnt me before they refund, but I had reported the fraud immediately.
My insurance company is delaying my hospitalization reimbursement for over four months, claiming incomplete documents even after submission of all proofs.

After my marriage, my husband and I decided to live with his parents. However, constant interference from his mother has caused several fights between us. I am seeking help to establish healthy boundaries while keeping the marriage intact.
My neighbours newly built balcony extends over my compound, blocking sunlight into my kitchen. Despite multiple discussions, they refuse to modify it. I want the encroachment addressed amicably.

I paid an advance for a catering service for my daughters wedding, but the caterer backed out at the last moment citing a better offer elsewhere. This caused major inconvenience and financial loss. I need compensation for breach of agreement.
My employer reduced my bonus amount arbitrarily, even though my performance rating was excellent. I want clarity on the policy and restoration of the promised incentive.

The local bank branch wrongly reported a missed EMI in my credit record, affecting my CIBIL score. I provided proof of timely payments, but no correction has been made. I need this rectified immediately.

My fathers will allocated equal property shares to my sister and me, but she has refused to register the documents. I have made several requests to proceed legally. Im seeking a peaceful division of assets.

The doctor at a private hospital performed a wrong diagnostic test and prescribed medication based on incorrect results. This led to unnecessary health complications. I want accountability for medical negligence.

A nearby restaurant has been disposing waste into the open drain next to our house, creating unbearable odour and mosquito infestation. Weve complained to local authorities but nothing changed. We want immediate corrective action.

I paid full fees for my sons coaching classes, but the institute has shut down suddenly citing financial losses. They have not refunded any amount. Im demanding reimbursement of the unused portion of fees.
I work as a nurse and was denied maternity benefits despite being eligible under the hospitals policy. My repeated HR requests were ignored. I want rightful compensation for the leave period.
Our apartment association imposed an additional maintenance charge only on pet owners. I believe this is discriminatory and unfair. I want a review of the policy for equal treatment.

After selling my car through a dealer, I later learned it was transferred without my consent and used for illegal activities. I have not received the promised payment either. I seek police and legal assistance.
My spouse and I disagree about the care of our aging parents. Both families expect us to stay with them, creating constant conflict. We want guidance on finding a mutually agreeable arrangement.
I was overcharged by a telecom company despite switching plans to a cheaper one. Their customer care hasnt resolved the issue for three months. I need reimbursement for the excess amount.
My business partner has been signing contracts on behalf of our company without my consent. Some of these deals are risky and not approved. I want to formalize our decision-making process legally.
My insurance claim for home flood damage was rejected because the company claimed the cause was 'wear and tear'. The flooding happened due to heavy rains. I want a fair reassessment of my claim.
My neighbours newly built wall has blocked access to the common drainage system shared by our houses. Water stagnation has become a problem. We want the wall realigned without escalating conflict.
Our family jointly owns agricultural land, but my uncle is cultivating and selling produce without sharing profits. Im seeking proper division or agreed revenue sharing.
I invested in a startup and was promised returns in 6 months. Its been over a year, and the founders stopped communicating. I suspect misuse of investor funds.
My builder changed the apartment layout from the original plan without consent, reducing my balcony space. I want either compensation or restoration to the agreed design.
The private school where my daughter studies suddenly increased the annual fee by 30% without notice. Many parents, including me, find this unaffordable. We want a fair reconsideration.
My colleague has been spreading false rumours about my performance at work, affecting my reputation. Ive already raised a complaint with HR, but no action has been taken. I need formal redressal.
The hospital staff administered expired medication to my grandmother during her admission, leading to complications. We have proof from the pharmacy slip and want legal action.
Our tenant has refused to vacate the property after the lease ended, citing pandemic-related hardship. Weve given multiple notices but no response. We need a peaceful eviction plan.
I purchased a two-wheeler insurance add-on for zero depreciation, but during claim settlement, the company applied depreciation charges. I feel cheated and want the amount corrected.

My spouse left the marital home several months ago without explanation and has cut off contact. I need to understand the legal implications regarding separation, potential abandonment, and how to proceed with divorce if necessary.

My employer uses performance improvement plans (PIPs) unfairly, setting unrealistic targets to push out employees rather than genuinely helping them improve. I've been placed on one despite consistent positive feedback previously.

I discovered my bank, 'Secure Trust', shared my detailed transaction history with a third-party marketing firm without my explicit consent, violating privacy regulations. I want this practice stopped and confirmation my data is removed.
A home cleaning service I hired, 'Spotless Maids', used a harsh chemical that damaged my wooden flooring. They deny responsibility, claiming the damage was pre-existing, which is untrue.
A nursing home failed to prevent my elderly parent from developing severe bedsores due to inadequate turning and care protocols. This indicates neglect and caused significant suffering.
My brother owes me money from a joint investment we made years ago. He acknowledges the debt informally but keeps delaying repayment with various excuses. I need a formal agreement or repayment.

I am selling my apartment. A potential buyer made an offer which I accepted, but they are now trying to renegotiate the price significantly lower based on minor issues found during inspection, threatening to back out.

A former client posted false and defamatory reviews about my freelance business online after a minor disagreement over project scope, negatively impacting my reputation and attracting fewer inquiries.
My neighbour has installed a very large satellite dish on their roof that is visually intrusive and potentially violates local aesthetic guidelines for our historic neighbourhood.

My insurance company is classifying damage to my commercial property as flood-related (which isn't covered) instead of storm-related wind/rain damage (which is covered), based on questionable assessment reports.
sub_category: Cause of loss classification dispute (Commercial Property)

description: My spouse wants to make significant, risky investments with our joint savings without my agreement. We have conflicting views on financial risk tolerance and future planning.
My employer is asking me to sign a revised employment contract with less favourable terms (reduced benefits, longer notice period) under pressure, implying job security depends on signing.

A bank error led to a duplicate debit from my account. While they eventually reversed one charge, they refuse to compensate for the consequential losses (bounced check fee from another bank) caused by the error.

I paid an interior designer, 'StyleSpaces', a large advance. They provided initial concepts but have since become unresponsive, missed deadlines, and failed to deliver the promised detailed plans or material selections.
A dentist recommended and performed extensive, costly procedures (multiple crowns) that a second opinion suggests were unnecessary and overly aggressive for my actual dental condition.
My adult child's spouse is creating conflict within the family, interfering in decisions about grandchildren and isolating my child from the rest of the family. We need help improving communication.
The previous owner of my house failed to disclose known issues with the foundation (covered up cracks) which are now causing significant structural problems requiring expensive repairs.
sub_category: Failure to disclose defects (Real estate sale)

description: My minority shareholder in the business is unreasonably blocking necessary operational decisions, potentially violating the shareholders' agreement and harming the company's progress.
My neighbour frequently hosts loud band practice sessions in their garage late at night, well beyond acceptable noise hours for our residential area.
My insurance company is refusing to renew my long-standing health insurance policy after I developed a chronic illness, effectively dropping me when I need coverage most.
My spouse and I have very different parenting styles regarding screen time and technology use for our children, leading to constant disagreements and undermining each other's rules.
My employer incorrectly classified me as an independent contractor instead of an employee, denying me benefits like paid leave, PF contributions, and insurance coverage.
My bank provided inaccurate information about the eligibility requirements for a government-backed small business loan scheme, causing me to waste time applying unsuccessfully.
I purchased an extended warranty for an electronic device from 'TechGuard'. The device failed within the warranty period, but they are denying the claim based on a technicality in the fine print.
A hospital emergency room misdiagnosed my appendicitis as indigestion, sending me home. My condition worsened significantly, requiring emergency surgery later and a longer recovery due to the delay.
My siblings and I disagree about how to financially support our aging parents. Some contribute more than others, leading to resentment and arguments about fairness.
A shared wall between my apartment and my neighbour's transmits excessive noise (TV, music). Building management acknowledges the poor sound insulation but is slow to take action.

My company hired a consultant based on their advertised expertise. The advice provided was generic, impractical, and ultimately useless, failing to meet the project objectives specified in the contract.
My neighbour has built a large compost heap near our shared property line which attracts rodents and emits strong odours, impacting my ability to use my garden.

My insurer approved repairs for my car at a specific garage, but the quality of the repair work done by that garage is substandard (mismatched paint, panel gaps). The insurer is hesitant to authorize rework.
My spouse and I have conflicting views on managing household chores and responsibilities, leading to feelings of unfairness and frequent arguments about workload distribution.
My employer is delaying the reimbursement of legitimate business expenses I incurred, citing complex approval processes, affecting my personal finances.

A bank representative pressured me into opening a credit card account with high fees and unfavorable terms, which I didn't fully understand at the time. I feel I was subjected to aggressive sales tactics.

I purchased software online ('CodeGenius') advertised with lifetime updates. The company now requires a paid subscription for new features that were previously included, effectively ending the 'lifetime' promise.
A hospital failed to diagnose a serious infection promptly during my post-operative recovery, leading to sepsis and requiring intensive care. I believe the delay was due to inadequate monitoring.
My in-laws constantly interfere in my marriage, offering unsolicited advice and criticizing my parenting/household management. This is causing significant stress between my spouse and me.
A tenant in my building is violating the 'no pets' clause in their lease agreement. Despite warnings from management, the pet remains, causing issues for other tenants with allergies.
A key supplier unexpectedly terminated our long-standing supply contract without adequate notice, citing vague 'strategic changes', causing major disruption to my business operations.
My neighbour's teenage children frequently play loud music late into the night, especially on weekends, disrupting sleep for surrounding houses. Direct requests to lower the volume have been ignored.
My insurance company's appointed surveyor significantly undervalued the damage to my property after a fire, leading to an inadequate settlement offer that won't cover reconstruction costs.
My spouse and I are struggling to communicate effectively after infidelity. We want to explore reconciliation but need professional help to address trust issues and rebuild the relationship.
My employer denied my request to access my personnel file, which I need to review for accuracy regarding performance evaluations and disciplinary records.
My bank charged me fees for maintaining a minimum balance, even though the drop was caused by their own system error temporarily blocking a valid deposit.
A rental car company, 'GoDrive Rentals', charged my credit card for alleged damages (minor scratches) that were present when I picked up the car and which I noted on the initial inspection form.
A hospital emergency room failed to properly clean and treat a deep wound, leading to a serious infection requiring hospitalization and further surgery.
My divorced parents constantly argue and criticize each other during child handover times, creating a stressful and unpleasant environment for the children.

A real estate agent misrepresented the condition of a property's roof ('recently replaced') when I purchased it. Soon after moving in, major leaks occurred, revealing the roof was old and poorly patched.
My business partner wants to take on significant debt for expansion, which I believe is too risky given current market conditions. We cannot agree on the financial strategy.
My neighbour is storing multiple unregistered vehicles on their property, creating an eyesore and potentially violating local ordinances regarding property use.
My insurer denied coverage for specialized therapy recommended by my doctor, claiming it's 'experimental' despite evidence of its effectiveness for my condition.
My spouse and I are arguing about how to divide substantial assets, including property, investments, and business interests, as part of our divorce proceedings.
My employer provides inadequate facilities for breaks and rest during long shifts, potentially violating labour laws regarding working conditions.
My bank is refusing to release funds from a deceased relative's account despite my providing the necessary legal documentation (death certificate, will, probate order).
sub_category: Release of funds from deceased account

description: A furniture store, 'Comfy Living', significantly delayed the delivery of my custom sofa order, well beyond the promised timeframe, without adequate communication or compensation for the delay.
A care facility failed to properly secure my elderly relative, who has dementia, allowing them to wander off the premises unsupervised, resulting in a dangerous situation.
My parents are providing significantly more financial assistance to my sibling than to me, creating feelings of inequality and resentment within the family.
A commercial landlord is unreasonably refusing to negotiate lease renewal terms for my small business, effectively forcing me out despite my long and reliable tenancy.
My business partner is using company resources (staff time, equipment) for personal projects without authorization or reimbursement, breaching our partnership agreement.
My neighbour leaves their bins out incorrectly (wrong day, overflowing) resulting in fines from the municipality which are sometimes mistakenly applied to my property.
My insurance company requires me to use their preferred network of repair shops, which are inconveniently located or have poor reputations, limiting my choice after an accident.
My spouse and I are separating and disagree on who should keep the family pet, which we are both deeply attached to.
My employer failed to provide legally mandated meal breaks during long shifts, expecting employees to work through them consistently.
My bank applied payments to my credit card incorrectly (e.g., towards lower interest balances first), resulting in higher interest charges than expected.

A warranty claim for my faulty washing machine was denied by 'ApplianceCare Warranty' because I couldn't produce the original purchase receipt, even though I have bank statements and product registration.
A doctor failed to diagnose a fracture on an initial X-ray, leading to delayed treatment and improper healing, requiring corrective surgery later.
My siblings are pressuring our elderly mother to sell her home and move into care prematurely, against her expressed wishes. I want to ensure her autonomy is respected.
My tenant is consistently late paying rent, causing financial difficulty for me. They offer excuses but haven't adhered to payment plans.
A vendor supplied faulty raw materials that caused defects in my finished products, leading to customer returns and reputational damage. The vendor disputes the material was faulty.
My neighbour has started parking a large commercial truck on the residential street, obstructing views and potentially violating local parking regulations for commercial vehicles.
My insurance company closed my claim prematurely, before all related medical bills were received, leaving me responsible for outstanding costs.
My spouse made significant unilateral financial decisions (e.g., large purchases, loans) without discussion, impacting our joint finances and causing trust issues.
My employer is proposing changes to my work schedule that conflict with my childcare responsibilities, and my request for minor adjustments has been inflexibly denied.
My bank failed to notify me about changes to account fees and charges, resulting in unexpected debits from my account.
sub_category: Lack of notice regarding fee changes

description: A clothing item I purchased shrank significantly after the first wash, despite following the care label instructions precisely. The store refuses a return, claiming I must have washed it incorrectly.
A dentist extracted the wrong tooth during a procedure. While they acknowledged the error, their offer of compensation seems inadequate for the mistake and future dental work needed.
My parents promised financial help for my wedding, but my sibling's recent financial troubles have caused them to reconsider, leading to family tension and uncertainty about wedding plans.

A property line dispute involves a very old tree whose trunk sits on the boundary. My neighbour wants to cut it down due to perceived risk, while I want to preserve it. We disagree on ownership and responsibility.

My company is merging with another, and the terms offered for my existing stock options seem less favourable than initially indicated, potentially diluting their value unfairly compared to other employees.
My neighbour has installed excessively bright decorative lighting that stays on all night, illuminating my property and disturbing wildlife. They dismiss my concerns about light trespass.
My renters insurance claim for items damaged due to a leak from the apartment above was denied. The insurer, 'TenantSafe', claims the damage source is a building issue, not covered by my policy.
My spouse wants to make significant changes to our child's religious upbringing, contrary to our previous mutual understanding and agreement when we married.
My employer failed to pay me for mandatory training hours completed outside of regular work shifts, claiming training time is unpaid.
I believe my bank, 'Metro Financial', is churning my investment portfolio excessively to generate commissions, rather than acting in my best interest as my financial advisor.
An airline, 'SkyHigh Airways', lost my checked baggage containing essential medication and valuable items. Their compensation offer is standard and doesn't cover the actual loss or inconvenience.
A hospital improperly restrained my elderly relative during a period of confusion, causing bruising and distress, without attempting less restrictive measures first.
My sibling, who acts as caregiver for our disabled parent, is restricting access for other family members and making decisions unilaterally about care and finances.
A property developer used misleading marketing materials (e.g., doctored images of views) for an off-plan apartment I purchased. The finished property differs significantly from what was promised.
My business partner is refusing to provide access to financial records and account books, raising concerns about transparency and potential mismanagement of funds.
My neighbour frequently leaves their large dog unattended in the yard, and it often escapes and roams the neighbourhood, causing safety concerns for children and other pets.
My insurer is demanding I pay back part of a claim settlement, stating they overpaid due to an administrative error on their end months ago.
